story_16_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Fwahahaha!
A splendid display! We concede!
story_16_02000/2401_1001_0200_10:
You stuck to your earnest and straightforward
tactics, and we stuck to our ninja tactics.
We may have lost, but we have no regrets!
story_16_02000/2401_1001_0600_10: I’m not a child. I know why we lost that battle.
story_16_02000/2401_1001_0900_10:
Listen to me! Right now, we are not just father
and daughter, but equals on the same team.
story_16_02000/2401_1001_1000_10: This defeat is shared. Do not blame only yourself.
story_16_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You can’t spoil me like that!
If you really consider me an equal,
you should be more strict with me!
story_16_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Besides, I don’t want to take your kindness for
granted! I have to become stronger so that
I can proudly call myself your equal.
story_16_02000/2401_1001_1500_10: That’s why I’m going to go on a journey to train!
story_16_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
I understand. Do what you must!
Be diligent in your training, Daughter.
story_16_02000/2401_1001_1800_10:
I guess this is good-bye for a while.
I promise I’ll come back stronger.
story_16_02000/2401_1001_1900_10: So when I do, let’s battle together!
story_16_02000/2401_1001_2100_10:
My apologies. I am sorry you had to witness
our familial squabbles.
story_16_02000/2401_0401_2300_10:
I would love to.
But even if I did, I know she’d send me away.
story_16_02000/2401_0401_2400_10:
Moreover, she is an accomplished ninja herself.
I must respect her wishes.
story_16_02000/2401_0402_2600_10:
Perhaps. But as a parent, I sometimes wish
she would depend on me more.
story_16_02000/2401_0402_2700_10:
But then again, I also know that it is my duty
as a parent to respect her decisions.
story_16_02000/2401_1001_2800_10:
To see my daughter act with such resolve...
I must continue to find my own strength as well.
story_16_02000/2401_1001_2900_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ], forgive my sudden
request, but...may I join your team?
story_16_02000/2401_0401_3100_10:
Indeed! I cannot allow myself to be weaker than
Janine when she returns!
story_16_02000/2401_0302_3200_10: It’d be great with you on the team!
story_16_02000/2401_0402_3300_10:
Fwahaha!
Leave anything poison related to me!
story_16_02000/2401_1001_3400_10:
You may have beaten me, but don’t forget
that I am a member of the Indigo Elite Four.
story_16_02000/2401_1001_3500_10: I will definitely be of use to your team.
story_16_02000/2401_1001_3600_10:
As long as we can watch each other’s back
and try to cover each other’s weaknesses,
we can surely surpass our current limits!
